title: Verify compatibility and stability of Next.js 16 and React 19
description: Ensure that the project builds and runs without errors or warnings when using Next.js 16 and React 19, verifying there are no compatibility issues or deprecated usage.

steps.description: Run a clean install of all dependencies including Next.js 16 and React 19
Build the project using the configured build process
Check that the build completes successfully with no compatibility warnings or errors
Start the development server and navigate through major pages including homepage and tour page
Verify no runtime console errors or hydration mismatches appear

title: Test smooth scrolling and UI performance using GSAP and Lenis
description: Validate that the smooth scrolling context provided by Lenis and animations by GSAP work seamlessly across supported browsers without jank or stutter.

steps.description: Open the homepage and scroll through content sections
Confirm scroll is smooth without frame drops or janky behavior
Interact with animated components on the homepage and tour page
Verify animations trigger correctly and complete without errors

title: Verify accessibility and consistent styling of reusable UI components
description: Check all reusable UI components such as Buttons, Cards, Sections, MagneticButton, and GlassCard for accessibility compliance and consistent styling across the site.

steps.description: Render all UI components in their typical states and usage contexts
Check that components use proper ARIA attributes and keyboard navigation is supported
Confirm styling matches design specifications and there are no visual inconsistencies

title: Validate Tour booking page functionality and booking flow
description: End-to-end test the tour booking page ensuring all booking actions such as form input, validation, submission, and confirmation work as expected.

steps.description: Navigate to the Tour page
Fill in all required booking form fields with valid data
Submit the booking form
Verify submission succeeds and confirmation message or page is displayed
Attempt to submit booking form with invalid or missing data
Check appropriate validation messages are shown and submission is blocked

title: Check CSS and Tailwind CSS v4 compliance without warnings or errors
description: Verify there are no CSS warnings or errors related to Tailwind CSS v4 syntax or configuration both in IDE (VS Code) and during build.

steps.description: Open the project in VS Code and check the Problems/Warnings tab for CSS or Tailwind warnings
Ensure there are no Tailwind v4 related warnings or errors in the IDE
Run the build process and monitor console output for any CSS errors or warnings
Confirm the build process completes without any Tailwind CSS or PostCSS warnings or errors

title: Verify explicit 'use client' directives on client components
description: Ensure that all client components using browser APIs include an explicit 'use client' directive to prevent hydration errors and maintain correct client/server separation.

steps.description: Review all client components source files for the presence of 'use client' directive
Validate all client components that use browser APIs have 'use client' directive as the first statement
Run the application and verify no React hydration warnings or errors occur
Confirm smooth client-side rendering without hydration mismatches

title: Validate usage of next/font/local and next/image optimizations
description: Check that fonts are loaded via next/font/local and images use next/image component for optimization and cumulative layout shift (CLS) reduction.

steps.description: Inspect font imports to confirm next/font/local usage
Verify fonts are optimized and fallback invisible text issues are not present
Review all image usages to confirm next/image component is used
Ensure images load responsively with placeholders or lazy loading and no CLS spikes occur

title: Check global styles application and smooth scrolling context
description: Verify that the root layout applies global styles and fonts correctly, and the smooth scrolling context is initialized and functional site-wide.

steps.description: Load the homepage and inspect applied global styles including fonts and base CSS
Confirm global styles are applied consistently across all pages
Verify the smooth scrolling context is active by testing scroll behavior on multiple pages
Validate that smooth scrolling context affects all scrollable elements without unexpected behavior

title: Test client-side rendering feedback and UI responsiveness
description: Ensure that all user interactions provide immediate visual feedback and the UI does not freeze or lag during client-side navigation and booking actions.

steps.description: Navigate between homepage and tour page multiple times
Check that navigation is smooth with loading indicators if any and no layout shifts occur
Perform booking form interactions such as typing and submissions
Validate that UI updates promptly with correct feedback after each action

title: Verify project configuration files correctness
description: Validate that next.config.ts and postcss.config.mjs are correctly configured for the project requirements, supporting Tailwind CSS v4, PostCSS, and Next.js optimizations.

steps.description: Review next.config.ts file for correct Next.js settings and image/font optimization config
Ensure configuration supports required features and contains no invalid settings
Review postcss.config.mjs for Tailwind CSS plugin setup and compatibility with Tailwind v4
Verify PostCSS configuration enables styling best practices without errors
